summary: New more acceptable look of Calder.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/429/caldern.png[/img][/center]

[center][b]Hello again.[/b]
I have decided to make all of the champions more acceptable for ladies. So as you can see, now i have the pleasure to represent you new Calder. Ive changed his default outfit to fur (you can see how big he is). Scaled his size  (Make him just a little bigger, not that much like Marcurio, he is just a human.) And change his apperence completle. Now he have blond hair with maching yellow eyes. So thats all. Enyoj you new looking big man, watching you back. 
[/center]

[i] Sorry for my english.[/i]

[b]My other mod\'s:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9807]Vampiric Marcurio[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9974#]Belrand New Strength[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10000]Vampiric Calder[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10085]Vilkas Better Look[/url]

[b]Armour that i used in the picture:[/b] 
[i](i reccomend this, he look amaizing in this armour ; ) Make sure you take black and red retexture!)[/i]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807]Blue Stripes Elite[/url]

[b]Recommended mod\'s[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[b]Credits:[/b]
To creator of NPC Editor, i hope it will be more option soon, to make Skyrim companions much more better.
author: Gnatozuj
